name: David Perry
body:
### I Love The Whole World But thinks it needs to be better. I'm deeply compelled by Effective Altruism; the idea that, with careful examination, some philosophy, and a lot of science, we can optimize the amount of good we do for the world to improve it by orders of magnitude. For example, [GiveWell](http://www.givewell.com) identifies charities a thousand times more cost-effective at saving lives, yet are less funded than others. I hope to either work directly on projects that steer the course of history to this path, or donate a significant amount of my income to organizations that do. Previously a project manager for the localization team at Disney Social Games, I realized programming is an incredibly powerful means to this end, and finally took the plunge by joining The Iron Yard Academy to learn web development. ### Projects for The Iron Yard Academy ## [Clipboard for SEEDS](https://github.com/SEEDlings/clipboard)

Demo Day - Clipboard for SEEDS from TheIronYard on Vimeo.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
